name: Fighty Monsters (beta)
description:
Fighty Monsters is a 1v1 battle card game where two players build a team of 3 monster cards. Players simultaneously place card(s) from their hands facedown, these cards command their monsters. The turns are shared, and monsters with higher speed stats move first. A player loses if all 3 of their monsters reach 0 HP. The game is pretty easy to learn, but the vast amount of unique scenarios and options creates a high skill ceiling.

Join our discord! https://discord.gg/CEbgZ8x

Contents
x2 - 42 monster cards (each player gets their own deck of each card)
x2 - 10 "input" cards (each player has one of each of these)
6 counter/cooldown tracking cards (these sit by the monsters in play)
x6 - 9 unique counter types
x6 - d20 (these are used to track health, each monster has 15, when we do IRL playtesting, we use the MtG Spindown life trackers)
